tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very professional and to the point. At the same time she explained different issues to me very precisely. Then during the treatment she was very friendly and did it in the most perfect way. Her experience was showing all the way throughout the cleaning process. She also explained what further can be done for the improvement of my teeth and answered all my questions with a lot of patience and grace. Would certainly recommend her to anyone who is looking to go to the dentist and especially someone like me who is mostly reluctant. The experience will be seamless.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time out to write a detailed review ,truly appreciate

review: They charge twice the amount for everything and also the consultation was charged 500 whereas the mentioned amount was 300. Also instead of fixing the root canal problem they did filling in other tooth and charged 4000. The mentioned doctor is not treating the patient , it is other person who does the consultation when asked they told she comes only on Saturday
reply_text:
Hope your  pain is relieved and treatment is complete. 
    Some procedures take intervention of senior dentist for which you were asked to visit with an appointment. 
  You were mentioned charges and provided with a bill for dental procedures.

review: I have been visiting her for my dental issues since 2 years. Doctor is always reachable and treats patients very friendly. She clearly explains the problem and takes good time to provide a quality treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Im satified with the treatment.I feel treatment was up to mark .I really recomment this hospital for any of the dental issues
